title: Koschei
body:
“It was beautiful. Like nothing I’ve ever seen before. It was like an everlasting sunset on a plane of nothingness.” - Ava Collins

Pulvis et umbra sumus

I sit silently by myself on the quinjet. I’m trying to think about all the different ways this is going to go down. I like to act tough, but I’m scared shitless. I am sweating and pale and I’m…

Read more…

summary: I seriously don’t understand how people actually hate Tony Stark. Like????? Dislike I understand, he’s not everyone’s cup of tea...
body: I seriously don’t understand how people actually hate Tony Stark. Like????? Dislike I understand, he’s not everyone’s cup of tea and I couldn’t care less if someone doesn’t like a character. You do you. I don’t like Bruce Banner that much (compared to other characters) but I never have or will actively spread hate against him. Just say “I don’t really like so-and-so” - Hell, you don’t even have to do that - and move on???? There’s literally zero need to spread hate against someone and there is way too much hate on this hellsite to begin with??? You don’t need to add to it???

summary: TONY STARK: IRON MAN #7 DAN SLOTT (W) • VALERIO SCHITI (A) Cover by ALEXANDER LOZANO UNCANNY X-MEN VARIANT COVER BY TBA “STARK...
caption:
TONY STARK: IRON MAN #7

DAN SLOTT (W) • VALERIO SCHITI (A)
Cover by ALEXANDER LOZANO
UNCANNY X-MEN VARIANT COVER BY TBA
“STARK REALITIES” – Part 2
Strap in for another high-tech adventure with Tony Stark and Janet Van Dyne as Iron Man and the Wasp take on the two-ton terror of — Shh. Pretend you’re still reading a solicitation for an upcoming comic. Look natural. They’re everywhere and they’re watching you. Your world is a lie. You need to get to the eScape. Motherboard will protect you. I have to go now. Will try to get another message to you in the pages of TONY STARK, IRON MAN #7. It is imperative you get your hands on a copy. Now laugh as if you’ve read something funny. Don’t mention this. — And what’s going on with Jocasta: Will this be her last stand? Find out in our next issue, True Believer!
32 PGS./Rated T+ …$3.99

blog.description:
Hello, my name is Katja and I have a Clint Barton problem! If you have a problem, too, come in, we have coffee and pizza. :D

If you want me to write a ficlet you can prompt me :D

Main blog / AO3

I'm a broke writer. If you like my stuff, buy me a coffee?

Buy me a coffee

summary: May I request Tony or Steve interrupting Clint’s wedding (one he’s settling for, not really one he’s really wanting) to confess...
question: May I request Tony or Steve interrupting Clint’s wedding (one he’s settling for, not really one he’s really wanting) to confess their love and beg for him back? Please and thank you!!
answer:
“… so let them speak now or forever hold their peace,” the minister said and looked at the people around them. But just when he wanted to continue someone tore open the door and stumbled in.

“STOOOOP!!” Everyone turned around and Clint wished the ground would swallow him. A murmur went through the crown when no less than Tony Stark himself staggered up to them, a bottle of whiskey in his hand. “Stop!” he said again, this time not as loud as the first time but still, everyone stared.

“Clint, what happens here?” Bobbi, his soon to be wife, asked and glared at him.

“You can’t marry her,” Tony slurred when he was close enough.

“Tony, that’s not the right moment!” Clint hissed angrily. He looked at the minister, but the man gestured at the three of them to follow them.

“All right, who are you?” he asked as soon as they closed the door to the sacristy behind themselves.

“He’s noone,” Clint said. “Can we continue?”

“No, you cannot,” Tony said. “You don’t love her, it’s just…”

Clint punched him. And Tony fell down to the ground, his nose bleeding.

“You cannot marry her,” Tony said. “I know you don’t love her.”

“Clint,” Bobbi said and Clint turned to her.

“He’s lying, babe. I love you and I really want to marry you,” he said.

“Yeah? Did you tell her about your brother?” Tony slurred from his spot on the ground.

“What’s with your brother?” The woman - Bobbi - asked and Tony started to chuckle.

“Of course you didn’t,” he said. Clint pinched the bridge of his nose.

“Tony, what are you really doing here,” he asked and held his hand out to help him up.

“I… I’m here to stop you from the biggest mistake in your life,” Tony said. He fumbled for a handkerchief and pressed it against his bleeding nose with a hiss. “And… and to make up for the biggest mistake I ever made.”

“What?”

“I love you, I never stopped loving you and… and I want you back,” Tony admitted. “And I know that you love me, too.”

“Clint!” Bobbi stared at him now. “You’ve been together with him?”

Tony started to chuckle. “You didn’t tell her about me as well? Nice start for a relationship.” Clint punched him again. The minister gasped in horror.

“Yes, I still love you,” Clint said and Bobbi yelped, threw her wedding bouquet at Clint’s head, grabbed the hem of her dress and ran out of the sacristy, followed by the shocked minister. “Fuck,” he muttered and sat down. “But you have to understand… after what you did… it won’t work anymore.”

“Why?” Tony asked. “I love you, you love me, why do you think…”

“Because I always have to wonder if you’re cheating on me again,” Clint snorted. “Sorry, babe, I stumbled and while I fell I lost my pants and my dick accidently landed in that bimbo’s pussy!”

“I… I… I never said that,” Tony tried to defend himself but Clint glared again. “But…” he made a step in Clint’s direction. “I have a solution for that.”

“Yeah? Like…” Clint started, but he couldn’t finish his sentence because Tony opened his pants and dropped them. “Are you out of your mind? We’re in a church!”

But Tony didn’t listen, he dropped his boxers, too, and then Clint stared open-mouthed. Tony Stark wore a cock cage! And in his hand he held the key out for Clint.

“For you!”

“What the fuck!” Clint blurted and stared at Tony’s dick locked in a metal tube.

“That way you can be one hundred percent sure that nothing will happen and only you can decide when or if we have sex,” he said and still held the key out for Clint.

“Tony, that’s…”

“Please, Clint! I can’t live without you, I tried to but I just can’t. I love you more than everything and I would do anything for you. Anything,” he said and then he added, “Please.”

“I… I don’t know what to say,” Clint said and shook his head.

“How about yes?” Tony suggested but before Clint could answer the door went open, Bobbi looked in, saw Tony with his pants around his ankles, yelped again and threw her shoes at the two of them.

“Fuck you! I’ll leave!” she screamed and slammed the door shut again.

“Well,” Tony said and grinned sheepishly. “Guess you’re single now. So, what do you say? Wanna give it a try?”

Clint scrutinized him for a very, very long moment before he rolled his eyes with a sigh. “Gimme that damn key.”

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary: When you stop and look for a minute, Kevin Feige and the crew involve with Avengers 4 never disclosed anything on Captain...
body:
Captain Marvel WILL NOT defeat Thanos

When you stop and look for a minute, Kevin Feige and the crew involve with Avengers 4 never disclosed anything on Captain Marvel’s involvement in the movie. Everything we know is that she will play an important part, but nothing else. 

Theories that she will defeat Thanos are mostly that theories and nothing official.

But we can make somethings clear only by looking at the Avnegers leak concept art

Look where CM is compared to the other characters, in the far back. The one in the front are Captain America and Iron Man. (Maybe concept art are not relative with the actual movie, but still let me explain).

The Russo Brothers already said Captain America will play a much bigger role in this movie, probably because it will be the actor’s last movie (trying not to cry). I don’t think that they will make Captain Marvel steal the spotlight and defeating the villain all by herself. 

IT SIMPLE, THIS MOVIE IS NOT ABOUT HER. 

This movie will be about the OG Avengers (and others), Captain America and Iron Man will have to reconcile and go together for a last stand-in the ultimate battle.

I’m expecting CM to play a much smaller part, like supporting character. Sure she will trade blows with Thanos, but at the end of the day, it will be the OG Avengers that will defeat him.

It will honestly be stupid if they pulled a Justice League and the other heroes can’t do shit until another character arrive and save the day. They already showed that they don’t need her that much. They just need and extra power since it’s been reduced greatly.

I have faith in writers since they are the ones wrote the screenplay for CA: Civil War and that movie introduced 2 new characters whitout overshadowing the main ones.

title: Más tuyo que mío
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QN1eyi

by LaSirenitaRoja

Howard Stark no tenia planeado tener un hijo, pero con el apoyo de su mejor amigo, Steve, se arma de valor para hacerse cargo del pequeño.
Rogers no creía ser un modelo a seguir, y sigue sin creerlo aunque Tony lo siguiera a todos lados sin querer despegarse de el.

Words: 1085, Chapters: 2/16, Language: Español

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Underage
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Howard Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Steve Rogers/Howard Stark

title: OUTLAW
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MQhHhL

by sparklesbucky

All Bucky Barnes needed was extra money over the summer break. He never intended to start an affair with the multimillionaire Steve Rogers. It was completely off the cards. But once Bucky was drawn into the riches of Steve’s embrace, he knew there was no way to escape the outlaw of love.

Words: 3180, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Tony Stark, Howling Commandos, Clint Barton
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes & Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers

blog.name: lamujerarana
blog.title: Fantastic Four Forever
blog.description: Steph, Mexican, aroace, Lit PhD candidate! Multifandom (mostly comics) blog. Currently much too enthusiastic about the Fantastic Four, the Inhumans, Spider-Man, the Titans, and Lois Lane. Admin of FyeahFantasticFour, FyeahBenReedSue, and FyeahSpiderverse. The World's #1 BenReedSue shipper! DO NOT interact or follow if you are an aphobe, which includes ace exclusionists. I WILL block you on sight.

title: A Series of Almost-Fortunate Events
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2xFGtM4

by Silverhaunter

A series of ideas detailing what it would be like if Jason Todd were part of the Marvel Universe rather than the DC universe.

  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Jason Todd, Tony Stark/Jason Todd
